# Unicode.GeneralCategory.spacingMark

**Case**

A spacing combining mark with positive advance width.

## Declaration

```swift
case spacingMark
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Spacing_Mark` (abbreviated `Mc`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.spacingMark
